description: Perfection in every turn and comfort on every run. Highly customizable, these boots have a thermo-mouldable shell and performance liner. A stiff fibreglass frame makes them responsive and nimble on no matter where you turn. With adjustable flex, you can tailor the boot's stiffness for any run. Plus, the S/Pro boots are the most comfortable Salomon has ever crafted, so you'll ride better because there is nothing to distract you from your line.Polyurethane shell with fibreglass framing transfers power efficiently to your ski.Coreframe 360 allows customization of the shell, cuff and liner.Shell can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance.Seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for a refined custom fit.Women's specific cuff and liner are tailored to female anatomy.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.35 mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.Normal width in a 100mm last.Alpine soles and GripWalk-ready.
name: Salomon S/Pro 90 Ski Boots - Women's
